original_text: God has made us his servants. So we are able to tell people the message of his new agreement. This new agreement is not about rules. Rules tell people what they must do and they bring death. But God's new agreement comes from his Spirit. And the Spirit brings new life to us, not death.
korean_text: 그가 또한 우리를 새 언약의 일꾼 되기에 만족하게 하셨으니 율법 조문으로 하지 아니하고 오직 영으로 함이니 율법 조문은 죽이는 것이요 영은 살리는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: God has made us his servants
So we are able to tell people
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 우리는 사람들에게 말할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: the message of his new agreement
This new agreement is not about rules
sentences.korean_translation: 이 새 언약은 규칙에 관한 것이 아닙니다

sentences.original_text: Rules tell people what they must do
sentences.korean_translation: 규칙은 사람들에게 무엇을 해야 하는지 알려줍니다

sentences.original_text: But God's new agreement comes from his Spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님의 새 언약은 그의 영에서 옵니다

sentences.original_text: And the Spirit brings new life to us
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 영은 우리에게 새 생명을 가져다줍니다
